entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is referred to as a young witch who prefers to be known by her surname only. She is mentioned in the conversation between Remus and Lupin.

entities.name: remus
entities.description: Remus is mentioned in the conversation as someone who calls Tonks 'Nymphadora'.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin finishes the sentence by saying that Tonks prefers to be known by her surname only.

entities.name: kingsley shacklebolt
entities.description: Kingsley Shacklebolt is introduced as a tall black wizard who bows in greeting.

entities.name: elphias doge
entities.description: Elphias Doge is mentioned as a wheezy-voiced wizard who nods in greeting.

entities.name: dedalus diggle
entities.description: Dedalus Diggle is introduced as an excitable wizard who has met Tonks before and drops his top hat in excitement.

entities.name: emmeline vance
entities.description: Emmeline Vance is mentioned as a stately-looking witch with an emerald-green shawl who inclines her head in greeting.

entities.name: sturgis podmore
entities.description: Sturgis Podmore is introduced as a square-jawed wizard with thick, straw-colored hair who winks in greeting.

entities.name: hestia jones
entities.description: Hestia Jones is mentioned as a pink-cheeked, black-haired witch who waves from next to the toaster.

relationships.description: Remus is mentioned as someone who calls Tonks 'Nymphadora'.
Lupin finishes the sentence by saying that Tonks prefers to be known by her surname only.
Kingsley Shacklebolt is introduced as a tall black wizard who bows in greeting to Elphias Doge.
Dedalus Diggle is introduced as an excitable wizard who has met Tonks before and drops his top hat in excitement.
Emmeline Vance is mentioned as a stately-looking witch with an emerald-green shawl who inclines her head in greeting to Sturgis Podmore.
Hestia Jones is mentioned as a pink-cheeked, black-haired witch who waves from next to the toaster in greeting to Tonks.
